profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your profile details and settings.

dangerZone.title: Danger zone
dangerZone.description: Delete your profile and all of its contents. This action is irreversible.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.advancedDescription: Settings apply to the current device and do not affect other devices.

theme.title: Theme
theme.systemDescription: Will be used depending on your device settings.
theme.lightDescription: This the theme for those who love bright colors.
theme.darkDescription: This the theme for those who love dark colors and want a cozy interface.

locale.title: Locale
locale.feedback: If you don't find the language you need, you can write to {link}, and we will add it.

apiKeys.title: API keys
apiKeys.description: Manage your API keys. These tokens allow other apps to control your whole account. Be careful!
apiKeys.createDescription: Enter a unique name for your token to differentiate it from other tokens.
apiKeys.createdDescription: Please copy your token and store it in a safe place. For security reasons we cannot show it again.
apiKeys.emptyDescription: Create your first API key to get started.

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.description: Manage your webhooks. Webhooks allow other apps to receive events from your account.
webhooks.createDescription: Enter a unique URL for your webhook, and select the events you want to receive.
webhooks.createdDescription: Please copy your secret token and store it in a safe place. Use it to verify events, we will send requests to your URL. Confirm authenticity by comparing the {requestHeader} request header. For security reasons we cannot show it again.
webhooks.emptyDescription: Create your first webhook to get started.

create.title: Create collection
create.description: Create a new collection to organize your bookmarks.

login.title: Log in to your Shotly account
login.label: Log in
login.noAuthProviders: No auth providers are available at the moment. Please contact the administrator to get access.
login.error: An error occurred while logging in. Please try again.

verificationForm.title: Enter verification code
verificationForm.description: We've sent a verification code to your email

back.label: Want to go back to homepage?
